summary: This test module verifies the translation of iMod5 NPF (Node Property Flow) settings into MODFLOW 6 NPF package configurations, covering horizontal and vertical anisotropy, isotropic cases, regridding behavior, validation handling, and error conditions.
business_intent: Guarantee accurate and robust conversion of legacy iMod5 groundwater model parameters to MODFLOW 6, enabling reliable model setup and execution in automated workflows.
